CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics Adoption Metrics Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Topics will include a new analytics page, where knowledge managers and admins will have access to a set of metrics that details the health of their adoption. Tenants will have health targets to reach to keep them on track for adopting Viva Topics, as well as recommended actions to perform to drive each metric to healthy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics Adoption Metrics Dashboard
OldVersion.description: ,Topics will include a new analytics page, where knowledge managers and admins will have access to a set of metrics that details the health of their adoption. Tenants will have health targets to reach to keep them on track for adopting Viva Topics, as well as recommended actions to perform to drive each metric to healthy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
OldVersion.description:
Now while writing an email, you can reorder
tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier
to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Android
CurrentVersion.description: ,Provides cloud-based Android remote assistance connection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Android
OldVersion.description: ,Provides cloud-based Android remote assistance connection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Frosted Glass Backgrounds in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Frosted Glass is a type of background effect that helps users keep their privacy with a background blur, but in a more professional and creative way. It let users have graphics with a blur effect together. Frosted Glass can be activated with a PNG image, that usually comes with some graphics in a transparent background. With the new frosted glass effects, the transparent area is turned into a blur background while the graphic remains as the part of background effect. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Frosted Glass Backgrounds in Teams Meetings
OldVersion.description: Frosted Glass is a type of background effect that helps users keep their privacy with a background blur, but in a more professional and creative way. It let users have graphics with a blur effect together. Frosted Glass can be activated with a PNG image, that usually comes with some graphics in a transparent background. With the new frosted glass effects, the transparent area is turned into a blur background while the graphic remains as the part of background effect. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video Closed Captions in PowerPoint Live
CurrentVersion.description:
Closed Captions will now be supported for
embedded videos in PowerPoint Live for Teams. If the video contains out-of-band
closed captions, all viewers will automatically have the option to turn closed
captions on for the video.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video Closed Captions in PowerPoint Live
OldVersion.description:
Closed Captions will now be supported for
embedded videos in PowerPoint Live for Teams. If the video contains out-of-band
closed captions, all viewers will automatically have the option to turn closed
captions on for the video.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow/Block List - Support for URL top level domain block
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, Microsoft will allow customers to block URL via top level domain block. It will be honored during email mail flow and time of click inside teams and office apps.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow/Block List - Support for URL top level domain block
OldVersion.description: With this change, Microsoft will allow customers to block URL via top level domain block. It will be honored during email mail flow and time of click inside teams and office apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
CurrentVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
OldVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Electrical diagrams in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 2 license will be able to create graphical representations of electrical circuits and systems, among others, using new shapes for Electrical Diagrams in Visio for the web.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Electrical diagrams in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 2 license will be able to create graphical representations of electrical circuits and systems, among others, using new shapes for Electrical Diagrams in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Cause and Effect Shapes stencil in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to create cause and effect diagrams, such as fishbone and Ishikawa diagrams, from a blank drawing using the new Cause and Effect Shapes stencil in Visio for the web.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Cause and Effect Shapes stencil in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to create cause and effect diagrams, such as fishbone and Ishikawa diagrams, from a blank drawing using the new Cause and Effect Shapes stencil in Visio for the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New contextual predicates in service-side auto-labeling (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will support adding the following new contextual based predicates to auto-labeling: Document property is; File extension is; Document size equals or is greater than; Document created by (only available in advanced rules in OneDrive and SharePoint locations); Document name contains words or phrases

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New contextual predicates in service-side auto-labeling (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: This feature will support adding the following new contextual based predicates to auto-labeling: Document property is; File extension is; Document size equals or is greater than; Document created by (only available in advanced rules in OneDrive and SharePoint locations); Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified compose box
CurrentVersion.description: A simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions. Note: This is for the new Teams experience only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified compose box
OldVersion.description:
A
simplified compose box UI will make it easier to create and send messages. Edit
your message, insert an emoji or call Copilot right from the compose box, or
click on the plus button to choose from the extended menu of actions.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Out-of-the-box document library templates
CurrentVersion.description:
We
are bringing the goodness of List templates to SharePoint document libraries.
Creating document libraries will now be a breeze with our ready-made templates
with scenario relevant content, structure, metadata, and content types - all to
save you time and maintain broader consistency across your content management
organization.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Out-of-the-box document library templates
OldVersion.description:
We
are bringing the goodness of List templates to SharePoint document libraries.
Creating document libraries will now be a breeze with our ready-made templates
with scenario relevant content, structure, metadata, and content types - all to
save you time and maintain broader consistency across your content management
organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR. Note: We will not be rolling out at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience this might cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
OldVersion.description: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Review set data minimization - Identify exact duplicates by default
CurrentVersion.description: ,Harness the built-in review set query within eDiscovery (Premium) review sets, specifically designed to pinpoint exact duplicates and encompassing email threads, to systematically reduce your review set data by an average of 30%, eliminating the need to trigger analytics manually post ingestion. Gain full visibility into all hash values utilized in de-duplication and email threading algorithms, ensuring a seamless and efficient review process.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Review set data minimization - Identify exact duplicates by default
OldVersion.description: ,Harness the built-in review set query within eDiscovery (Premium) review sets, specifically designed to pinpoint exact duplicates and encompassing email threads, to systematically reduce your review set data by an average of 30%, eliminating the need to trigger analytics manually post ingestion. Gain full visibility into all hash values utilized in de-duplication and email threading algorithms, ensuring a seamless and efficient review process.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Enhanced security mode on by default
CurrentVersion.description:
Enhanced security mode is being turned on by default to “Balanced” mode for x64 Windows, x64 macOS, x64 Linux, and ARM64 systems. Also, administrators have 2 new policies to manage the Enhanced security mode user experience: EnhanceSecurityModeIndicatorUIEnabled and EnhanceSecurityModeOptOutUXEnabled.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-security-browse-safer

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Enhanced security mode on by default
OldVersion.description:
Enhanced security mode is being turned on by default to “Balanced” mode for x64 Windows, x64 macOS, x64 Linux, and ARM64 systems. Also, administrators have 2 new policies to manage the Enhanced security mode user experience: EnhanceSecurityModeIndicatorUIEnabled and EnhanceSecurityModeOptOutUXEnabled.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-security-browse-safer

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy Teams at Scale for frontline with dynamic teams.
CurrentVersion.description: ,Deploy teams at scale for your frontline workers using dynamic teams in the Teams Admin Center. Dynamic teams will automate member management to ensure your teams are always up to date. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy Teams at Scale for frontline with dynamic teams.
OldVersion.description: ,Deploy teams at scale for your frontline workers using dynamic teams in the Teams Admin Center. Dynamic teams will automate member management to ensure your teams are always up to date. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Extend DLP controls to Firefox browser (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, you will be able to extend the
Microsoft Purview DLP controls to Firefox browsers. DLP admins will be able to
set policies to prevent exfiltration of sensitive information through the
Firefox browser by preventing actions such as copying data from a sensitive
document to another document using the Clipboard, printing a sensitive
document, copying to USB removeable media, or copying to a network share.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Extend DLP controls to Firefox browser (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description:
With this update, you will be able to extend the
Microsoft Purview DLP controls to Firefox browsers. DLP admins will be able to
set policies to prevent exfiltration of sensitive information through the
Firefox browser by preventing actions such as copying data from a sensitive
document to another document using the Clipboard, printing a sensitive
document, copying to USB removeable media, or copying to a network share.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Audio tracks and descriptions for Stream on SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Video owners and editors will soon have the ability to upload multiple audio tracks in a single video when using Stream (on SharePoint). These audio tracks will act as alternates to the main audio track.  This feature can be used to add multiple language audio tracks for multi-lingual organizations, or to add audio descriptive tracks or to add audio tracks for other purposes. Viewers of the video will be able to select which audio track they would like to hear by clicking the Audio Tracks button (headphones icon) in the video player.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Audio tracks and descriptions for Stream on SharePoint
OldVersion.description: Video owners and editors will soon have the ability to upload multiple audio tracks in a single video when using Stream (on SharePoint). These audio tracks will act as alternates to the main audio track.  This feature can be used to add multiple language audio tracks for multi-lingual organizations, or to add audio descriptive tracks or to add audio tracks for other purposes. Viewers of the video will be able to select which audio track they would like to hear by clicking the Audio Tracks button (headphones icon) in the video player.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insightful Policy Performance
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Communication Compliance homepage provides two columns that offer a quick overview of policy performance: the first column shows the number of scanned parent items in real time, giving visibility into scanning progress; the second column keeps you informed about parent items that meet policy conditions, ensuring you stay updated on potential issues requiring attention and maintaining control over communication compliance. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insightful Policy Performance
OldVersion.description: ,The Communication Compliance homepage provides two columns that offer a quick overview of policy performance: the first column shows the number of scanned parent items in real time, giving visibility into scanning progress; the second column keeps you informed about parent items that meet policy conditions, ensuring you stay updated on potential issues requiring attention and maintaining control over communication compliance. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Scheduling improvements in Shifts app
CurrentVersion.description:
In the Shifts app,
people count, and full names, will show in the calendar view. The most recent
filter settings will be saved automatically. Managers will be able to add
inline notes in the day view, and notes can also be added using the Graph API.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Scheduling improvements in Shifts app
OldVersion.description:
In the Shifts app,
people count, and full names, will show in the calendar view. The most recent
filter settings will be saved automatically. Managers will be able to add
inline notes in the day view, and notes can also be added using the Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Israel datacenter region and Advanced Data Residency availability
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 will launch a new local cloud region in Israel. The Advanced Data Residency add-on ("ADR") will be available in Israel and provide eligible customers with committed data residency in the Israel local cloud region, prioritized tenant migration services, and expanded coverage of Microsoft 365 workloads and Customer Data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Israel datacenter region and Advanced Data Residency availability
OldVersion.description: Microsoft 365 will launch a new local cloud region in Israel. The Advanced Data Residency add-on ("ADR") will be available in Israel and provide eligible customers with committed data residency in the Israel local cloud region, prioritized tenant migration services, and expanded coverage of Microsoft 365 workloads and Customer Data. This item is cancelled.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management in Teams Admin Center to manage the Apps access for tenants, end-users, and groups
CurrentVersion.description:
App centric management introduces new admin
settings to control who in the tenant can install Teams apps. First, admins can
set a default value for new apps that are published to Teams app store. Second,
admins can edit the availability of an app to 'All users can install',
'Specific users and groups can install', or 'No user can install'. This feature
evolves the existing app permission policies and provides admins with the
ability to manage access to the app individually. The app permission policies for
existing customers are migrated to maintain existing app availability in the
tenant.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management in Teams Admin Center to manage the Apps access for tenants, end-users, and groups
OldVersion.description:
App centric management introduces new admin
settings to control who in the tenant can install Teams apps. First, admins can
set a default value for new apps that are published to Teams app store. Second,
admins can edit the availability of an app to 'All users can install',
'Specific users and groups can install', or 'No user can install'. This feature
evolves the existing app permission policies and provides admins with the
ability to manage access to the app individually. The app permission policies for
existing customers are migrated to maintain existing app availability in the
tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Full document fingerprinting
CurrentVersion.description:
Document Fingerprinting in Microsoft Purview
Data Loss Prevention (DLP) converts a standard form into a sensitive
information type (SIT), which you can use in the rules of your DLP policies.
This update extends support for Fingerprint-based SITs to additional workloads,
including SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Endpoint and enables admins to
adjust threshold while creating Fingerprint SITs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Full document fingerprinting
OldVersion.description:
Document Fingerprinting in Microsoft Purview
Data Loss Prevention (DLP) converts a standard form into a sensitive
information type (SIT), which you can use in the rules of your DLP policies.
This update extends support for Fingerprint-based SITs to additional workloads,
including SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Endpoint and enables admins to
adjust threshold while creating Fingerprint SITs.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for offline search without Spotlight dependency
CurrentVersion.description:
iOS's offline search implementation relies on
Spotlight (Apple's local search index). In some cases, Intune policy can block
the use of Spotlight, which will completely disable offline search for users.
We are adding support for offline search even if your company’s
Intune policy blocks use of Spotlight.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support for offline search without Spotlight dependency
OldVersion.description:
iOS's offline search implementation relies on
Spotlight (Apple's local search index). In some cases, Intune policy can block
the use of Spotlight, which will completely disable offline search for users.
We are adding support for offline search even if your company’s
Intune policy blocks use of Spotlight.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect files on remote / mapped network devices
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this capability organizations can leverage
Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention to protect sensitive content on files
stored on remote network shares or mapped network drives with the same
protection behavior as a file on a mounted hard drive.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect files on remote / mapped network devices
OldVersion.description:
,With this capability organizations can leverage
Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention to protect sensitive content on files
stored on remote network shares or mapped network drives with the same
protection behavior as a file on a mounted hard drive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - customization & preview of email notifications
CurrentVersion.description:
,There are some significant enhancements made to the Microsoft
Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification. These improvements
provide admins with greater flexibility and control over the end-user
notification email: 1. Enhanced Token Support: We have expanded our token
library to offer precise and detailed information to your end users. 2. Email
Message Customization: You now have the ability to decide whether the matching
email messages should be included or excluded in the end-user notification
emails. 3. Tailored Email Content: Customize the sender's display name and
email body using HTML formatting, allowing for a personalized touch. 4. Email
Preview: Prior to sending email notifications, you can review them to ensure
they align perfectly with your requirements. These enhancements empower you to refine your communication and provide
a more tailored experience for your end users with Microsoft Purview Data Loss
Prevention.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - customization & preview of email notifications
OldVersion.description:
,There are some significant enhancements made to the Microsoft
Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification. These improvements
provide admins with greater flexibility and control over the end-user
notification email: 1. Enhanced Token Support: We have expanded our token
library to offer precise and detailed information to your end users. 2. Email
Message Customization: You now have the ability to decide whether the matching
email messages should be included or excluded in the end-user notification
emails. 3. Tailored Email Content: Customize the sender's display name and
email body using HTML formatting, allowing for a personalized touch. 4. Email
Preview: Prior to sending email notifications, you can review them to ensure
they align perfectly with your requirements. These enhancements empower you to refine your communication and provide
a more tailored experience for your end users with Microsoft Purview Data Loss
Prevention.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Upload and share documents on large emails
CurrentVersion.description:
On Outlook accounts when you try to attach a
file to an email that has hit the maximum size limit, or when an attachment
will push the email over that limit, you will be prompted to upload the file to
OneDrive so that you can still easily share the document.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Upload and share documents on large emails
OldVersion.description:
On Outlook accounts when you try to attach a
file to an email that has hit the maximum size limit, or when an attachment
will push the email over that limit, you will be prompted to upload the file to
OneDrive so that you can still easily share the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Storyline per-user control for Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow admins to designate which users in their Viva Engage network have the ability to create new storyline posts. It gives admins another option for how to support storyline in their network in addition to the current choice of enabling or disabling storyline for all users. This feature will not change who can reply or react to the storyline posts from those users who have been given storyline privileges. That is, all users with access to Viva Engage can reply and react to storyline posts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Storyline per-user control for Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow admins to designate which users in their Viva Engage network have the ability to create new storyline posts. It gives admins another option for how to support storyline in their network in addition to the current choice of enabling or disabling storyline for all users. This feature will not change who can reply or react to the storyline posts from those users who have been given storyline privileges. That is, all users with access to Viva Engage can reply and react to storyline posts.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
CurrentVersion.description:
,With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill
and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how
much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected
locations and scope.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description:
Remote
attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame
video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition
(including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
OldVersion.description:
Remote
attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame
video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition
(including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Immersive spaces in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: ,Immersive spaces in Teams makes it easier for Teams users to transform their meetings into a 3D experience. With just one click, you can connect with your team in a pre-built immersive space right from the view menu in Teams meetings. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Immersive spaces in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description:
,Immersive spaces in Teams makes it easier for Teams
users to transform their meetings into a 3D experience. With just one click,
you can connect with your team in a pre-built immersive space right from the
view menu in Teams meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Management of BYOD (Bring your own device) meeting spaces with Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description:
The BYOD (bring your
own device) rooms in the Pro Management Portal provides IT admins with a
comprehensive overview of their BYOD rooms' utilization and activities. With
this new addition, IT admins will gain valuable insights into how these spaces
are being utilized, enabling them to make data driven decisions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Management of BYOD (Bring your own device) meeting spaces with Teams Rooms Pro Management
OldVersion.description:
The BYOD (bring your
own device) rooms in the Pro Management Portal provides IT admins with a
comprehensive overview of their BYOD rooms' utilization and activities. With
this new addition, IT admins will gain valuable insights into how these spaces
are being utilized, enabling them to make data driven decisions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this capability we are extending the Admin
Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information
Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365
Defender portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
OldVersion.description:
,With this capability we are extending the Admin
Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information
Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365
Defender portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: MIP Label Support for Events
CurrentVersion.description:
,Tenants who have setup MIP sensitivity labels
for use on events will now have support in Outlook for Android to both read and
write labels to their meetings with enforcement of rules such as encryption as
defined by tenant admins.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: MIP Label Support for Events
OldVersion.description:
,Tenants who have setup MIP sensitivity labels
for use on events will now have support in Outlook for Android to both read and
write labels to their meetings with enforcement of rules such as encryption as
defined by tenant admins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Standardization of Viva Learning Webapp Links
CurrentVersion.description: Webapp links will have user-friendly and easily addressable links to pages

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Standardization of Viva Learning Webapp Links
OldVersion.description: Webapp links will have user-friendly and easily addressable links to pages

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Granular scoping with role-based access control (RBAC)
CurrentVersion.description:
IT departments in large organizations are built
in a way that some of the day-to-day tasks are delegated to specific people or
roles in the organization following the industry standard of least privilege
access. Admins have a need to delegate role based permissions to users or
analysts in a granular way. In some cases, this delegation is based on
function, and in other cases it is based on geography or scope of work. In this
release, Audit will provide role based information with Audit search results through
the UI.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Granular scoping with role-based access control (RBAC)
OldVersion.description:
IT departments in large organizations are built
in a way that some of the day-to-day tasks are delegated to specific people or
roles in the organization following the industry standard of least privilege
access. Admins have a need to delegate role based permissions to users or
analysts in a granular way. In some cases, this delegation is based on
function, and in other cases it is based on geography or scope of work. In this
release, Audit will provide role based information with Audit search results through
the UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
OldVersion.description: Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Advanced Fingerprinting
CurrentVersion.description:
Document Fingerprinting in Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention (DLP) converts a standard form into a sensitive information type (SIT), which you can use in the rules of your DLP policies. This update extends support for Fingerprint-based SITs to additional workloads, including SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Endpoint and enables admins to adjust threshold while creating Fingerprint SITs.

This also allows you to detect when a portion of your sensitive document is exposed using partial matching support with Fingerprinting across the compliance solutions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Advanced Fingerprinting
OldVersion.description:
Document Fingerprinting in Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention (DLP) converts a standard form into a sensitive information type (SIT), which you can use in the rules of your DLP policies. This update extends support for Fingerprint-based SITs to additional workloads, including SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Endpoint and enables admins to adjust threshold while creating Fingerprint SITs.

This also allows you to detect when a portion of your sensitive document is exposed using partial matching support with Fingerprinting across the compliance solutions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Answers in Viva - AI Topic suggestions in publisher
CurrentVersion.description:
With the help of AI topic extraction, we can
offer suggested topics based on the user's question. Our AI topic extraction
recommends up to 3 topics to add to one's question based on what they wrote.
These can be existing Viva topics or newly generated ones that the user can
create and add. The user still must select and add our AI suggested topic since
they do not automatically get attached to the question. The user can also still
search and add their own topic and choose not to use our AI suggested topics.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Answers in Viva - AI Topic suggestions in publisher
OldVersion.description:
With the help of AI topic extraction, we can
offer suggested topics based on the user's question. Our AI topic extraction
recommends up to 3 topics to add to one's question based on what they wrote.
These can be existing Viva topics or newly generated ones that the user can
create and add. The user still must select and add our AI suggested topic since
they do not automatically get attached to the question. The user can also still
search and add their own topic and choose not to use our AI suggested topics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support in Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability organizations will be able to delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC) via Azure Active Directory Administrative Units.  Eg – German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support in Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection
OldVersion.description: With this capability organizations will be able to delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC) via Azure Active Directory Administrative Units.  Eg – German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Desktop to web browser join experience for attendees in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description:
Schedulers can enable
the 'have attendees join from a web browser' setting so that attendees joining
the virtual appointment on desktop will be routed to the Teams web browser
experience. This allows attendees to have access to engagement features including
raise hand and live reactions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Desktop to web browser join experience for attendees in Virtual Appointments
OldVersion.description:
Schedulers can enable
the 'have attendees join from a web browser' setting so that attendees joining
the virtual appointment on desktop will be routed to the Teams web browser
experience. This allows attendees to have access to engagement features including
raise hand and live reactions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - eDiscovery guest reviewer delegated access
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables secure and convenient external guest reviewer access to eDiscovery Premium review sets within a case.  This feature empowers eDiscovery Premium admins and managers to follow more traditional collaboration practices that will boost confidence and workflow defensibility by allowing outside counsel to cooperate more directly without increasing cost or risk.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - eDiscovery guest reviewer delegated access
OldVersion.description: This feature enables secure and convenient external guest reviewer access to eDiscovery Premium review sets within a case.  This feature empowers eDiscovery Premium admins and managers to follow more traditional collaboration practices that will boost confidence and workflow defensibility by allowing outside counsel to cooperate more directly without increasing cost or risk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations and teams now have the flexibility to customize terminology in line with their own goal setting methodology and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms and structures
OldVersion.description:
Organizations and teams now have the flexibility
to title and structure goals in line with their own goal setting methodology
and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows Message Extension: New Default Actions
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft Teams Workflows Message Extension will include new default actions to assist user collaboration. These actions will simplify collaboration within a conversation by enabling users to kick off common workflows and post adaptive cards to conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows Message Extension: New Default Actions
OldVersion.description: The Microsoft Teams Workflows Message Extension will include new default actions to assist user collaboration. These actions will simplify collaboration within a conversation by enabling users to kick off common workflows and post adaptive cards to conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description:
Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel
Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to
co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items.
Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless
of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes
automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
OldVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit webinar details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in Webinars
OldVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit webinar details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – new sequence indicators
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Insider Risk Management will provide new sequence indicators that start with activities on devices that may lead to a data security incident, including downgrading/removing file labels, archiving files, and downloading files from unallowed sites. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – new sequence indicators
OldVersion.description: With this update, Insider Risk Management will provide new sequence indicators that start with activities on devices that may lead to a data security incident, including downgrading/removing file labels, archiving files, and downloading files from unallowed sites. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Redirect incoming call directly to voicemail from incoming call notification
CurrentVersion.description:
Allows users to
easily redirect an incoming call to voicemail without having to accept or
reject the call when receiving calls on a Teams certified phone device.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows All-in-one experience
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update,
Teams Rooms on Windows will support all-in-one and board device form factors,
such as the Surface Hub 3.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows All-in-one experience
OldVersion.description:
With this update,
Teams Rooms on Windows will support all-in-one and board device form factors,
such as the Surface Hub 3.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling across different time zones
CurrentVersion.description:
When scheduling a
meeting with people in different time zones, the organizer will be prompted
with additional insights regarding each participant's respective time zone. The
Scheduling Assistant will now help find a time that works for meeting
participants across time zones.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling across different time zones
OldVersion.description:
When scheduling a
meeting with people in different time zones, the organizer will be prompted
with additional insights regarding each participant's respective time zone. The
Scheduling Assistant will now help find a time that works for meeting
participants across time zones.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant settings moving to the toolbar
CurrentVersion.description: We are moving the settings for the Scheduling assistant to the toolbar to reduce clicks and a more seamless scheduling experience. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant settings moving to the toolbar
OldVersion.description:
We are moving the settings for the Scheduling assistant to the
toolbar to reduce clicks and a more seamless scheduling experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Support for layers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license can now use layers to group a related set of shapes in a drawing and change properties of all the layer members at once.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Support for layers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license can now use layers to group a related set of shapes in a drawing and change properties of all the layer members at once.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Planner Personal Plans
CurrentVersion.description: Today in Planner, all created plans must be contained by an M365 group or a roster. With the new Personal plan API, plans can be contained by a new type of container, called a user container. For these types of plans, the creator of the plan is the only member and owner.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Planner Personal Plans
OldVersion.description: Today in Planner, all created plans must be contained by an M365 group or a roster. With the new Personal plan API, plans can be contained by a new type of container, called a user container. For these types of plans, the creator of the plan is the only member and owner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: People Search card on Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Include this card on your dashboard to facilitate searching for individuals within your organization, learning more about them, and initiating contact.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: People Search card on Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: Include this card on your dashboard to facilitate searching for individuals within your organization, learning more about them, and initiating contact.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage AMA - Private events, multiple hosts, and organizers
CurrentVersion.description: An AMA event can now be private and can now also have multiple organizers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage AMA - Private events, multiple hosts, and organizers
OldVersion.description: An AMA event can now be private and can now also have multiple organizers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Synced updates for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android devices and paired consoles.
CurrentVersion.description:
When
Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android devices are updated from the Teams Admin
Center, their paired consoles will get updated in tandem, ensuring a seamless
experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Synced updates for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android devices and paired consoles.
OldVersion.description:
When
Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android devices are updated from the Teams Admin
Center, their paired consoles will get updated in tandem, ensuring a seamless
experience.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Add individual file shortcuts in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will let you create a shortcut to files stored in other people's OneDrive and document libraries to be able to easily find it within your OneDrive. These file shortcuts can be moved, renamed, or deleted without impacting the source content, and they will show up in OneDrive for Web, Android, iOS, and sync client endpoints.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Add individual file shortcuts in OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description: This feature will let you create a shortcut to files stored in other people's OneDrive and document libraries to be able to easily find it within your OneDrive. These file shortcuts can be moved, renamed, or deleted without impacting the source content, and they will show up in OneDrive for Web, Android, iOS, and sync client endpoints.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Access Microsoft Lists, Power BI, Loop and Whiteboard content in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description:
You will be able to
easily find and open your Microsoft Lists, Loops, Power BI dashboards and
Whiteboard content in OneDrive for Web. If you have recently opened, shared, or
favorited one of these files, then it will appear in your Recent, Shared, and
Favorites views in OneDrive for Web.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Access Microsoft Lists, Power BI, Loop and Whiteboard content in OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description:
You will be able to
easily find and open your Microsoft Lists, Loops, Power BI dashboards and
Whiteboard content in OneDrive for Web. If you have recently opened, shared, or
favorited one of these files, then it will appear in your Recent, Shared, and
Favorites views in OneDrive for Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: New user analytics extended to Microsoft Outlook, Teams, and Office
CurrentVersion.description:
User
analytics improvements that provide deeper insights and filtering capabilities
for search adoption across user segments like geography, department and
occupation as well as search applications such as SharePoint, Microsoft Search
for Bing, and Microsoft365.com. New capabilities include search insights from
within Windows Search, Outlook, Teams and other Microsoft Office applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: New user analytics extended to Microsoft Outlook, Teams, and Office
OldVersion.description:
User
analytics improvements that provide deeper insights and filtering capabilities
for search adoption across user segments like geography, department and
occupation as well as search applications such as SharePoint, Microsoft Search
for Bing, and Microsoft365.com. New capabilities include search insights from
within Windows Search, Outlook, Teams and other Microsoft Office applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: MAM Tunnel - Strict tunnel support for iOS and Android via Edge
CurrentVersion.description: Only allow internet traffic via Edge when Tunnel is connected on iOS and Android.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: MAM Tunnel - Strict tunnel support for iOS and Android via Edge
OldVersion.description: Only allow internet traffic via Edge when Tunnel is connected on iOS and Android.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New settings available for your frontline manager in Shifts app
CurrentVersion.description: In the Shifts app, we are rolling out the ability for frontline manager to control additional functionalities through our Shifts settings page. Frontline managers will gain the ability to enable and disable swap shift request, offer shift request and/or time off requests for their teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New settings available for your frontline manager in Shifts app
OldVersion.description: In the Shifts app, we are rolling out the ability for frontline manager to control additional functionalities through our Shifts settings page. Frontline managers will gain the ability to enable and disable swap shift request, offer shift request and/or time off requests for their teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Copilot in Whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Whiteboard helps you kickstart and accelerate your ideation process to generate, categorize, and summarize your ideas.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Copilot in Whiteboard
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Whiteboard helps you kickstart and accelerate your ideation process to generate, categorize, and summarize your ideas.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot in Microsoft 365 Loop
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Loop helps you unlock the power of shared thinking—co-create, get up to speed, and stay in sync with your teammates. Now you can iterate with Copilot collaboratively as a team, co-create prompts, generate tables to help organize team projects, catch up where your teammates left off, summarize page content, and generate a recap for a teammate you're handing work off to.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot in Microsoft 365 Loop
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Loop helps you unlock the power of shared thinking—co-create, get up to speed, and stay in sync with your teammates. Now you can iterate with Copilot collaboratively as a team, co-create prompts, generate tables to help organize team projects, catch up where your teammates left off, summarize page content, and generate a recap for a teammate you're handing work off to.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Microsoft 365 Chat
CurrentVersion.description:
Your single destination to take on any task. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, and other apps, to help you draft content, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. It's available via multiple surfaces, including microsoft365.com, Teams, and Bing.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Microsoft 365 Chat
OldVersion.description:
Your single destination to take on any task. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, and other apps, to help you draft content, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. It's available via multiple surfaces, including microsoft365.com, Teams, and Bing.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: S/MIME support for sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description:
Outlook on the web will
support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) signature and
encryption as sensitivity label outcomes. Admins can define the label to have
S/MIME signature, encryption, or both and emails with those labels will enforce
S/MIME accordingly.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: S/MIME support for sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description:
Outlook on the web will
support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) signature and
encryption as sensitivity label outcomes. Admins can define the label to have
S/MIME signature, encryption, or both and emails with those labels will enforce
S/MIME accordingly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Stream Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview is
expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Stream.
As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate
5 new Microsoft Stream events that were previously generated only for Audit
Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit
Standard users: 1. StreamInvokeGetTranscript; 2. StreamInvokeChannelView; 3.
StreamInvokeGettExtTrack; 4. StreamInvokeGetVideo; 5. StreamInvokeGroupView

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Stream Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview is
expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Stream.
As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate
5 new Microsoft Stream events that were previously generated only for Audit
Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit
Standard users: 1. StreamInvokeGetTranscript; 2. StreamInvokeChannelView; 3.
StreamInvokeGettExtTrack; 4. StreamInvokeGetVideo; 5. StreamInvokeGroupView

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Yammer / Viva Engage Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview is
expanding access to wider cloud security events for Microsoft Viva Engage
(formerly known as Yammer). As part of the changes, standard users of Purview
Audit will begin to generate 6 new Microsoft Viva Engage events that were
previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following
events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. ThreadViewed; 2.
ThreadAccessFailure; 3. MessageUpdated; 4. FileAccessFailure; 5.
MessageCreation; 6. GroupAccessFailure

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Yammer / Viva Engage Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview is
expanding access to wider cloud security events for Microsoft Viva Engage
(formerly known as Yammer). As part of the changes, standard users of Purview
Audit will begin to generate 6 new Microsoft Viva Engage events that were
previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following
events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. ThreadViewed; 2.
ThreadAccessFailure; 3. MessageUpdated; 4. FileAccessFailure; 5.
MessageCreation; 6. GroupAccessFailure

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Connect shared channels in GCCH & DoD
CurrentVersion.description:
Work seamlessly and
securely with those inside and outside your organization. With Microsoft Teams
shared channels,
multiple organizations can work together in a shared space - have
conversations, schedule a meeting, share, and co-author files, and collaborate
on apps, without ever switching tenants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Connect shared channels in GCCH & DoD
OldVersion.description:
Work seamlessly and
securely with those inside and outside your organization. With Microsoft Teams
shared channels,
multiple organizations can work together in a shared space - have
conversations, schedule a meeting, share, and co-author files, and collaborate
on apps, without ever switching tenants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a survey, poll, or quiz to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding a survey, quiz, or poll using Microsoft Forms. You can add forms anywhere in the video timeline for videos you own. Go to Microsoft Forms to view responses and share a summary link with answers and scores in Microsoft Forms.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a survey, poll, or quiz to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding a survey, quiz, or poll using Microsoft Forms. You can add forms anywhere in the video timeline for videos you own. Go to Microsoft Forms to view responses and share a summary link with answers and scores in Microsoft Forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Domain-specific search
CurrentVersion.description:
Users will be able to
narrow down their search results and find what they are looking for faster. Get
more precise search results by picking up a specific domain like files, group
chat or Teams and channels. You can also search files or group chats by entering
a person name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex:  Microsoft Syntex is available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, Syntex capabilities such as document processing, image tagging, taxonomy tagging, content assembly, and OCR are available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex is available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants
OldVersion.description: With this release, Syntex capabilities such as document processing, image tagging, taxonomy tagging, content assembly, and OCR are available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
CurrentVersion.description:
With
the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The
users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content
simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is
available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
OldVersion.description:
With
the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The
users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content
simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is
available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Teams meeting templates added to Outlook Teams add-in
CurrentVersion.description:
New meeting templates for Virtual Appointment,
Webinar, and Town hall are available in the Teams meeting dropdown menu in the
Calendar tab in Outlook with the Outlook Teams add-in enabled. This allows
organizers to set up these broader Teams meeting scenarios directly within Outlook
and these will show up on calendars in both Outlook and Teams apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remove items from your activity feed
CurrentVersion.description:
Users will be able to
remove items they no longer need from their activity feed, helping the user
stay on top of their notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
OldVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour for Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour for Viva Engage private messages and community conversations, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour for Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: ,This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour for Viva Engage private messages and community conversations, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Protection of password protected, Unscannable and partially scannable documents on SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Three new predicates for Microsoft Purview DLP for SharePoint to help protect password protected, unscannable, and partially scannable documents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: new roles added for built-in Compliance Administrator, Information Protection, and Privacy Management related role groups.
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview provides a unified solution for managing data security, governance, compliance, and privacy across your organization's landscape.  Microsoft Purview built-in role groups are being extended with new roles to prepare for upcoming features and capabilities relevant to those role groups. Additional roles will be added to Microsoft Purview built-in role groups for Compliance Administrator, Information Protection related role groups, and Privacy Management related role groups.  This change will not disrupt the current capabilities for these role groups, it will enable admins in these built-in groups to manage additional data types in the future.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: new roles added for built-in Compliance Administrator, Information Protection, and Privacy Management related role groups.
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview provides a unified solution for managing data security, governance, compliance, and privacy across your organization's landscape.  Microsoft Purview built-in role groups are being extended with new roles to prepare for upcoming features and capabilities relevant to those role groups. Additional roles will be added to Microsoft Purview built-in role groups for Compliance Administrator, Information Protection related role groups, and Privacy Management related role groups.  This change will not disrupt the current capabilities for these role groups, it will enable admins in these built-in groups to manage additional data types in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exchange Auto-labeling supports non-mail enable security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Service side auto-labeling now supports scoping of exchange auto-labeling to non-mail enabled security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: False positive email release from Quarantine through threat explorer, email summary panel, and email entity page take action
CurrentVersion.description: ,SecOps can now mange False positives and take move to inbox (i.e. release) quarantined messages from Threat explorer and Email entity page without the need to tab out to the Quarantine portal to take the action.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Global Address List updates in new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description:
We are making some
adjustments to the GAL search and browse experiences. Users will be
asked to type in more characters to refine their search in some cases. There
will be some other visual improvements in error messaging. Another way to find recipients is by using the suggestion
dropdown picker in the To/Cc/Bcc lines.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training in DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Attack simulation and training (AST) in the Microsoft Defender for Office 365 is an intelligent risk reduction tool, which allows customers to run realistic attack scenarios in their organization, identify vulnerable users, and help drive behavior change through an integrated security awareness training program. It is to be made available in the DoD environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector crawl failure notifications in Service Health dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: Admins get a notification in the Service Health dashboard when Microsoft Graph connectors crawl fails.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Additional capabilities for Microsoft 365 users in Microsoft Project for the web
CurrentVersion.description:
Currently, users
with Microsoft 365 licenses can view projects shared with them by users of
Microsoft Project for the web. This update will enable Microsoft 365 users to
collaborate more seamlessly with Project users by editing shared projects. The
added capabilities enable Microsoft 365 users to access any functionality where
Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Project for the web overlap. Note: This feature
is specific to projects that are created within the default environment, such as
by using project.microsoft.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Recommended actions for finetuning policies
CurrentVersion.description:
,We are introducing additional recommended actions to provide guidance on fine-tuning your insider risk policies and implementing advanced configurations.
These new tasks and journeys will be accessible through the Recommended Actions page. 
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Browsed to generative AI websites indicator
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, we are adding a new indicator,
“browsed to generative AI sites,” for the risky browser usage policy template,
giving visibility into organizational usage of generative AI domains. User
information is pseudonymized by default with strong privacy controls in place
to protect end user trust. While visiting one of these AI domains may be
authorized by an organization, this indicator is designed to help ensure they
are correctly accounting for whether and how, these sites may be accessed in
policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals
to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft,
data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables
customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance,
and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are
pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in
place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Tag Management Settings
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will update default tag management settings in the Teams Admin Center to include "Microsoft Default" along with Team owners and members" and "Team owners.” You can update this to your preferred option of "Team owners" or "Team owners and members" at the tenant level and override the default. Note: This change only applies to Public cloud and does not apply to any special Cloud such as GCC, GCCH, DoD, Gallatin, and AirGap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Tag Management Settings
OldVersion.description: ,This feature will update default tag management settings in the Teams Admin Center to include ”Microsoft Default" along with Team owners and members" and "Team owners.” You can update this to your preferred option of "Team owners" or "Team owners and members" at the tenant level and override the default.
